title: Bonus: Nerd Credentials - November 2022
content:
Dan, James, Anna and Andrew discuss some of the winners and almost-winners from their Nerd Credentials live tour which aimed to find the nerdiest person in the UK. 

Do you have a 'nerd credential'? Send it to podcast@qi.com.  

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
